text: My bike skidded on the wet road and I fell
A car hit me from behind and ran away
I crashed into a divider near the highway
The truck driver swerved and hit my scooter
I have a flat tire and I am stuck in a dark area
My engine overheated and smoke is coming out
The customer refused to pay and slapped me
The restaurant owner shouted at me and pushed me
Some guys are following me and shouting bad words
I am feeling dizzy and chest pain
I cannot breathe properly and my vision is blurry
Fainted due to heat stroke near the park
Someone snatched my phone and ran
My delivery bag was stolen while I was inside
Robbers took my wallet at knife point
Car collision at the signal
Bumper damage due to sudden braking
Customer is drunk and acting violent
Severe back pain, cannot ride anymore
Ran out of petrol in a lonely road
